abstract: Italian fashion company Benetton announces plant to contribute to Rana Plaza Donors Trust Fund, which will compensate victims of 2013 clothing factory collapse in Bangladesh, in response to petition organized by international advocacy group.
lead_paragraph: Benetton, the Italian fashion designer, said Friday that it would contribute to a fund set up to compensate victims of a 2013 clothing factory collapse, which killed more than 1,100 people.
snippet: Benetton, the Italian fashion designer, said Friday that it would contribute to a fund set up to compensate victims of a 2013 clothing factory collapse, which killed more than 1,100 people.
